TopicTitle: How do you permanently change a planets orbit?

Articles.Content: Does anyone know how to permanently change a planets orbit? Ive tried multiple ways but every time I restart the game they are back to normal.
I think you can do that with hyperedit, even if I never tested that feature and I don't know if it's permanent.
Ive tried it with Hyperedit, but every time I reopen the game they are back to default.
I was expecting this to be a question about REALLY BIG rockets... (and yes, I know you can't move planets like you can asteroids, they're on-rails)
